early_life_description: Born to Carmine and Italia Coppola; grew up in New York, studied theater and film.
young_adult_description: Attended Hofstra University and UCLA Film School; began filmmaking.
adult_life_description: Directed landmark films like The Godfather trilogy and Apocalypse Now; won multiple Oscars.
late_life_description: Remains active in filmmaking and owns wineries.

early_life_description: Born in New York; trained as a musician and composer.
young_adult_description: Worked on film scores and orchestral projects.
adult_life_description: Father of Francis Ford Coppola and his siblings; won Academy Awards for film music.

early_life_description: Born in New York City; pursued performing arts.
young_adult_description: Married Carmine Coppola and had children including Francis and Talia.
adult_life_description: Supported family while maintaining artistic interests.

early_life_description: Younger sister of Francis; grew up in a creative family.
young_adult_description: Began acting in theater and film.
adult_life_description: Starred as Connie Corleone in The Godfather trilogy and Adrian in Rocky series.

early_life_description: Daughter of Francis Coppola and Eleanor Coppola; grew up around filmmaking.
young_adult_description: Acted in The Godfather Part III; later attended film school.
adult_life_description: Directed acclaimed films like Lost in Translation and The Virgin Suicides; won an Academy Award.

early_life_description: Born in Los Angeles; pursued visual arts.
young_adult_description: Married Francis Coppola and assisted with filmmaking projects.
adult_life_description: Directed documentaries and contributed to Francisâ€™s films.

early_life_description: Son of Francis and Eleanor; grew up around filmmaking.
young_adult_description: Worked as an assistant on films; studied film formally.
adult_life_description: Directed and produced multiple films, including collaborations with Wes Anderson.

early_life_description: Son of Talia Shire; grew up in a family immersed in the arts.
young_adult_description: Became a musician and actor in films.
adult_life_description: Known for roles in Rushmore, The Darjeeling Limited, and other collaborations.

early_life_description: Born Nicolas Kim Coppola, son of Talia Shire; nephew of Francis Coppola.
young_adult_description: Changed name to Cage to pursue acting independently.
adult_life_description: Academy Award-winning actor; starred in many major films including Leaving Las Vegas and National Treasure.

early_life_description: Daughter of Francis and Eleanor Coppola; raised with exposure to filmmaking.
young_adult_description: Directed short films and began studying film.
adult_life_description: Directed independent films, including Palo Alto.

early_life_description: Son of Francis and Eleanor Coppola; raised around movies.
young_adult_description: Studied film and worked in production.
